Desc.entry: Residential care home for older people, which is owned and managed by Sheffield City Council, Neighbourhoods and Community Care Directorate. Does not provide permanent care. Has 27 beds, which are used for respite and clients who require rehabilitation or a care package. This care home is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.
